t: Amazon leans on sales events to keep shoppers spending
s: April 18, 2025 - While not yet announced, Amazon is likely to reprise other events like the Summer Beauty Haul and Memorial Day sales, continuing its cadence of targeted promotions to drive demand between major tentpoles. Why it matters: These sales sharpen shoppers’ focus at a time when value-driven consumers are actively hunting for deals. They help build awareness and boost sales in specific categories, like pet supplies, where Amazon wants to expand share. They also drive up ad revenues, as brands ...
